summary: An ordinance accepting an easement from Carl G. Anderson and Olive B. Anderson, his wife, and Ward R. Furness and Margaret E. Furness, his wife, over a portion of Government Lot 3, Section 11, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W. M., in connection with the watermains pipeline right of way contemplated by Ordinances 85642 and 86134, and making an appropriation from the Water Fund as a betterment outlay and advance to Capital Account.
